title: Background Configuration
description: Schema for character background definitions. Backgrounds represent a character's history and provide attribute bonuses, starter abilities, and starting items.

$schema.description: Reference to the JSON schema file for validation

version.description: Configuration file version for compatibility tracking

BackgroundDefinition.description: A single background definition with category, bonuses, ability, and metadata

id.description: Unique identifier for the background (lowercase kebab-case)

name.description: Display name for the background shown to players

category.description: Background category determining bonus distribution pattern

description.description: Short description of the background for character creation

lore.description: Extended lore and background story flavor text

attributeBonuses.description: Attribute bonuses provided by this background (0-2 per attribute)

starterAbilityId.description: Unique identifier for the starter ability granted by this background

starterAbilityName.description: Display name for the starter ability

starterAbilityDescription.description: Description of the starter ability's effect

startingItems.description: Item IDs granted to characters with this background at creation

isPlayable.description: Whether this background can be selected during character creation

sortOrder.description: Display order in character creation UI (lower = earlier)

AttributeBonuses.description: Attribute bonuses provided by this background. All fields are optional; only specified attributes receive bonuses.

might.description: Physical power bonus affecting melee damage and carry capacity

fortitude.description: Physical resilience bonus affecting health and resistances

will.description: Mental fortitude bonus affecting magical resistance and focus

wits.description: Mental acuity bonus affecting initiative and perception

finesse.description: Dexterity bonus affecting accuracy and evasion
